name: Dome Eternal
description:
Dome Eternal is a local mutliplayer fight game created during the LvlUp  Game Jam 2022.  Choose your character among 8 iconic beasts, battle your friends and find out who is on the top of the food chain.

- Gameplay -

Choose a beast, pick up the nearest weapon and show the others who's boss.  Use the power of the reflective domes  to your advantage.

- Controls on Xbox controller -

Joystick to move, button "A" to jump and double jump, button "X" to shoot.

- Credits -

François Hennemann - 3D Art /Level Design/Sound Effects

Frédéric Cottier -  Programming/3D Art /Level Design/Sound Effects

 Jean-Yves Schäl - 3D Art/Sound Effects

Plume - Music
